subject: Sales
title: Tesla: The Anti-Marketing Brand
description: One-minute skill: Tesla: The Anti-Marketing Brand.

hook.text: Tesla spends zero on traditional advertising. It's one of the most recognized brands on Earth.

buildup.text: Musk turned himself into the brand. His personal presence replaced an entire marketing department.

discovery.text: Tesla relies on word of mouth, media buzz, and social media for virtually all brand awareness.

twist.text: This model is almost impossible to copy. It needs a founder who is as famous as the product itself.

climax.text: Tesla's lesson: authentic personality and a clear mission can outperform any advertising budget.

punchline.text: A mission people believe in markets itself.

quiz.question: How does Tesla build brand awareness without advertising?
options: Word of mouth, media coverage, and the founder's personal brand
